articles.description: Inside, the man allegedly donned a cowboy hat he found on a coat rack that belonged to a staff member and took himself on a tour of the exhibits.
articles.content:
A 25-year-old man will face court on Monday after an alleged night at the museum.
Police say that Paul Kuhn broke into the Australian Museum in Sydney's CBD in the early hours of Sunday, May 10.
Inside, he allegedly donned a cowboy hat he found on a coat ra… [+245 chars]
